context.text: Autonomous prefectures of China - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Province or Autonomous Region Name Chinese ( S ) Pinyin Designated minority Local name Capital
Autonomous prefectures are one type of Autonomous areas of China , existing at the prefecture level .
